articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary of day two of the Australian Open featuring Jack Draper, Nick Kyrgios and Novak Djokovic.
articles.title: Australian Open LIVE: Jack Draper v Mariano Navone, Novak Djokovic and Nick Kyrgios also in action - live text and radio commentary

articles.description: All the latest football news  and FA Cup reaction to the third round as Manchester United win at Arsenal & Tottenham struggle past Tamworth.
articles.title: Football & transfers latest: FA Cup reaction as Man Utd beat Arsenal to reach fourth round

articles.description: Fast-rising British star Jacob Fearnley beats an ailing Nick Kyrgios in the first round of the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Jacob Fearnley beats Nick Kyrgios to silence Melbourne crowd

articles.description: Arsenal's season is in the balance, as their FA Cup exit highlights manager Mikel Arteta's failure to sign a striker.
articles.title: Arsenal & Mikel Arteta pay price for failing to address striker flaw

articles.description: IOC chief Thomas Bach says swimmer Gary Hall Jr will get new Olympic medals after they were destroyed in the LA wildfires.
articles.title: Gary Hall Jr to receive new Olympic medals to replace his lost in LA fires

articles.description: Altay Bayindir was the subject of ridicule after his last Manchester United performance. Now manager Ruben Amorim saluted the goalkeeper as "our hero" as he inspired them into the FA Cup fourth round.
articles.title: Altay Bayindir: Turkish goalkeeper becomes Manchester United 'hero' in FA Cup win at Arsenal

articles.description: The Buffalo Bills dominate the Denver Broncos in a 31-7 Wildcard Weekend win that sets up a mouthwatering Josh Allen v Lamar Jackson clash in the next round.
articles.title: NFL play-off results: Josh Allen to face Lamar Jackson after Bills beat Broncos in wildcard round

articles.description: Stefanos Tsitsipas says his Australian Open first-round exit was "karma" after withdrawing from the men's doubles with his brother to focus on singles.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Stefanos Tsitsipas 'hit by karma' in first-round loss

articles.description: Barcelona come from behind to beat Real Madrid in an incident-packed Spanish Super Cup final in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Real Madrid 2-5 Barcelona: Hansi Flick's side win 15th Spanish Cup

articles.description: The Cleveland Cavaliers' 12-match winning run comes to an end with defeat by the Indiana Pacers.
articles.title: Indiana Pacers end Cleveland Cavaliers' 12-game winning run
